subject: Running
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Meb Keflezighi, Abdi Abdirahman, Khalid Khannouchi were given strong chances to make the United States Olympic team in the marathon. None did.
snippet: Meb Keflezighi, Abdi Abdirahman, Khalid Khannouchi were given strong chances to make the United States Olympic team in the marathon. None did.
